arcs.headline: Polly gets a major intelligence upgrade
arcs.summary: Our AI assistant Polly is now powered by OpenAI embeddings for sharper context retrieval and features a refined system prompt for clearer, more direct answers.

arcs.headline: Flexible model routing and legacy support
arcs.summary: We've updated the registry to support 'hidden' API-only models and restored access to legacy versions of Claude and Gemini for developers who need specific model behaviors.

arcs.headline: Frictionless credit handling
arcs.summary: We updated the Pollen deduction logic to allow temporary negative balances, ensuring your requests finish successfully even if they hit the limit mid-process.

one_liner: Polly gets smarter with new embeddings, model access expands to include legacy versions, and credit handling becomes more forgiving.
